OnRadar Episode#1: A Config Keeping Tale

This episode (In Hebrew) will cover our encounters with config keeping, yes we were all under the impression that Kubernetes,ConfigMaps, and Secrets have solved all the worlds problems … well no, it seems like it’s still an issue.
